100428.「おおっ。派手に やってやがんな。: Oh, wow. They're doing it in a big way.

100430.「なぁに ムスっとしてんだ ラスタ。\n ほら。こいつが <pc>。\n さっき:
What are you sulking about, Rasta? Here. This
is <pc>. That's the legendary talent
I was telling you about!

100431.「紹介するぜ <pc>。\n こいつは ラスターシャ！\n うち一番の カリスマ:
Let me introduce you, <pc>. This is
Rastasha! She's our most charismatic dancer.

100432.「まるで 私以外にも 踊り子を \n 抱えているかのような クチぶりね。:
You talk as if you have other dancers besides
me.

100433.「グワッハハハ！ 少数精鋭は オレの信条！\n 共に 伝説を築くに ふさわしい\:
Gwah-ha-ha-ha! The elite few are my credo! I
only call on those who are worthy of building
a legend with me.

100434.「そんなことより ラスタ。\n ……どうだ？ こいつなら いけるだろ？\n 例の:
That's not what I'm talking about, Rasta.
How's it going? He's good, right? He seems to
have completed the ritual without any trouble.

100436.「いやあ。ビックリしたぜ。\n はじめて ラスタに会った時以来の\n 衝撃だった:
Oh, man. I was so surprised. I haven't seen
Rasta since the first time I met him. I mean,
his pelvis is so...

100438.「そうそう！ 骨盤が てんでダメ……！ \n まさに 廃盤……:
Yes, yes! My pelvis is completely ruined. It's
really out of order...

100439.「って……ええええっ！ ダメ？\n 骨盤……ダメ？: I mean... eh! No? Pelvis... no?

100440.「まさか……通過儀礼を こなしたくらいで\n 本気で 私の合方がつとまると 思っ:
You didn't really think... that you'd be able to keep my partner just by going through the rite of passage, did you? If that's the case,
you're a very naive girl.

100443.「じつは ラスタは今 合方……\n 一緒に踊る パートナーを探しててよ。\n ち:
Actually, Rasta is currently looking for a
partner to dance with. He's a little
preoccupied.

100444.「勝手に 志願してくる奴ぁ 多いが \n ろくな奴が いなくてよ。プロデューサー:
There are a lot of people who volunteer on their own, but there aren't any good ones. I've been having a hard time finding a
producer I can help...

100445.「そこに現れた逸材が お前ってわけよ。 \n 今回は ちぃっと 時期が早すぎたが:
And you're the one who showed up. This time
it's a little too early... but I'm sure you'll
get the recognition you deserve in time.

100446.「他の奴にゃ クチも聞かなかったんだから\n それに比べりゃあ 上出来よ。\n:
I didn't hear a single mouthful from the other
guys, so I'm doing pretty well compared to
them. I'm a little too skittish, though.

100447.「まあ 優れた合方と ユニットを組むのは\n <pc>伝説 誕生への 近道だから:
Well, forming a unit with a superior partner
is a shortcut to the birth of the legend of
<pc>. For now, trust me and work on
your tricks.

100448.「おっと！ まずは 転職しねぇと\n 始まらねぇよな。グワッハハハ！:
Oops! First of all, you have to change jobs,
right? Gwahahahaha!

100449.「なんと！ オレがバッチリ ダーマ神殿に\n 根回しして もうすでに 転職できる:
Oh my God! I've already arranged with
Alltrades Abbey for you to get a new job.
Sounds like a producer to me, right?

100450.「なあに。礼には およばねぇよ。\n 踊り子プロデューサー ひと筋２０年。\n:
Hey. You don't have to thank me. Dancing
producer for 20 years. All this before
breakfast!

100452.「そう思って じつは さっき \n ダーマ神殿まで 根回ししに\n 行ってきたん:
So, in fact, I went to Alltrades Abbey earlier
to lay the groundwork...

100453.「なんと お前 すでに\n 踊り子に 転職できるらしいじゃねぇか！\n やっぱ:
What a surprise! I heard you can already
change your job to a dancer! A gem is
something else after all.

100454.「せめて 何かしてやれないかと 思ってな。 \n <pc>伝説の 幕開けを祝して:
I thought I'd do something for you at least. I
have prepared a gift to celebrate the
beginning of the legend of <pc>.

100455.「つーわけで 歌って踊って 実力つけて \n さっさと ラスタに 認められてくん:
So, sing, dance, get good at it, and hurry up
and get Rasta's approval! I'm looking forward
to the birth of the unit.

100456.「そうだな……レベル３０以上の\n 踊り子になれば さすがのラスタも\n 認めて:
Well...I guess if you become a level 30+
dancer, as expected Rasta will approve of you.

100457.「そしたら また オレんとこに来てくれよ。\n ラスタにバシっと 成長を見せつけ:
Then come visit me again. Let's show Rasta how
much you've grown!

103353.「あ！ 言い忘れてたが このテント……\n 勝手に入ると ラスタが怒るんだ。\n:
Ah! I forgot to mention that this tent... if
you enter without permission, Rasta will get
angry. Be careful with that. See you later!

118059.「そんな人と組んでも 足手まといなだけよ。\n 悪いけど 遊びじゃないの。\n:
Working with a person like that will only slow
you down. I'm sorry, but this is not a game.
I'm not willing to compromise at your level.

118060.「……しかし ちいっと前までは\n 営業に行くのも 面倒がるような\n ものぐさ:
...but a little while ago, I was a lazy dancer
who didn't even bother to go to the office...

118061.「最近 人が変わったように 意識高くなってよ。\n 踊りが達者なのは もとからな:
Lately, he's become a very conscious person, as if he's changed. I've always been a good dancer, but it's a wonder I'm still able to
dance. Gwahahahaha!
